Docs.summary: Instructs the task to exit as soon as possible, or to immediately exit if Execute is invoked after this method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Cancel() may be called at any time after the task has been instantiated, even before <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask.Execute%2A> is called.
Cancel calls may come in from any thread. The implementation of this method should not block indefinitely.
To cancel the build, both `Cancel` and `Execute` must return in any order.
